summary: To identify human genes and cellular pathways influencing SARS-CoV-1 and SARS-CoV-2 infection, we performed genome-wide measurements of different aspects of gene expression at the bulk and single-cell level.
title: Gene expression profiling of SARS-CoV-1/2 infected human cell lines at bulk and single-cell level
